content: **description ** sweet crochet cap features a pretty ruffle around the brim 1 ball of suggested yarn **sizes ** to fit child sizes 6 12-18-24 mos available at favecrafts com 1 as baby ruffle hat also available at michaels website on the wayback machine 2 1 http //www favecrafts com/crochet-for-baby/baby-ruffle-hat-crochet-pattern 2 https //web archive org/web/20090507093135/http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=e07086
